story_teamrocket_01_08000/2401_1201_0300:
There’s a nice breeze tonight, so I thought I’d
go for a walk...
story_teamrocket_01_08000/2401_1201_0400: With such a gloomy look on your face?
story_teamrocket_01_08000/2401_1201_0800:
What I’m doing now isn’t working... It’s not
enough. I have to change my approach.
story_teamrocket_01_08000/2401_1201_0900: Did something happen back at the ruins?
story_teamrocket_01_08000/2401_1201_1000:
When we were battling today, Blue had to cover
for me quite a bit.
story_teamrocket_01_08000/2401_1201_1100:
So I think I know how you feel. I want to be
stronger, too.
story_teamrocket_01_08000/2401_1201_1200:
If you don’t think what you’re doing now is
helping, I’d be happy to brainstorm ways we could
both get stronger. We can do it together!
story_teamrocket_01_08000/2401_1201_1400: It’s hard to improve on your own, right?
story_teamrocket_01_08000/2401_1201_1500:
When I traveled around Alola, I faced so many
challenges...and it was help from my friends that
gave me the strength to get through it all!
story_teamrocket_01_08000/2401_1201_1600:
If you need some help, I’d be more than happy
to help you in any way I can!
story_teamrocket_01_08000/2401_1201_1700:
Would you mind sharing with me what you’re
thinking right now, Paulo?
story_teamrocket_01_08000/2401_1201_1900:
I know that relying on others might be one way
to get stronger...
story_teamrocket_01_08000/2401_1201_2000: But I don’t think it’s gonna work for me.
story_teamrocket_01_08000/2401_1201_2200:
I know how he’s probably feeling right now...
Being so fixated on strength that it makes you
anxious...and reckless...
story_teamrocket_01_08000/2401_1201_2300:
Yes, it reminds me of a certain rascal I used
to know...
story_teamrocket_01_08000/2401_1201_2400:
I suppose we should let him make his mistakes
now. He’ll be fine, as long as he ends up back on
the right path in the long run.
story_teamrocket_01_08000/2401_1201_2600:
We’re Pokémon Trainers... If he does end up going
down the wrong path, I’ll be right there to stop
him...with a Pokémon battle!
story_teamrocket_01_08000/2401_1201_2700: OK! Let’s get back to work, then!
story_teamrocket_01_08000/2401_1201_2800:
There can’t be too many places where Team
Rocket could hide. If we search the island, we’re
bound to find ’em!
story_teamrocket_01_08000/2401_1201_2900:
I’ll keep eyes on the ground. Lorelei, you can
search from the water. And Blue, could you get
us a bird’s-eye view from above?
story_teamrocket_01_08000/2401_1201_3200: You better not have lost, Red...
